mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.user_password AS "userPassword", a.wacht_name AS "wachtName", a.wacht_open_id AS "wachtOpenId", a.wacht_unit_id AS "wachtUnitId", a.user_praise AS "userPraise", a.user_title AS "userTitle", a.user_pone AS "userPone", a.user_sex AS "userSex", a.user_status AS "userStatus", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.user_head_image AS "userHeadImage", a.wachat_city AS "wachatCity", a.wachat_province AS "wachatProvince", a.wachat_country AS "wachatCountry", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.wacht_name LIKE '%'||#{wachtName}||'%' '%'+#{wachtName}+'%' concat('%',#{wachtName},'%')
AND a.wacht_open_id LIKE '%'||#{wachtOpenId}||'%' '%'+#{wachtOpenId}+'%' concat('%',#{wachtOpenId},'%')
AND a.user_praise LIKE '%'||#{userPraise}||'%' '%'+#{userPraise}+'%' concat('%',#{userPraise},'%')
AND a.user_title LIKE '%'||#{userTitle}||'%' '%'+#{userTitle}+'%' concat('%',#{userTitle},'%')
AND a.user_pone LIKE '%'||#{userPone}||'%' '%'+#{userPone}+'%' concat('%',#{userPone},'%')
AND a.nick_name LIKE '%'||#{nickName}||'%' '%'+#{nickName}+'%' concat('%',#{nickName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( id, user_name, user_password, wacht_name, wacht_open_id, wacht_unit_id, user_praise, user_title, user_pone, user_sex, user_status, create_time, update_time, nick_name, user_head_image, wachat_city, wachat_province, wachat_country, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{wachtName}, #{wachtOpenId}, #{wachtUnitId}, #{userPraise}, #{userTitle}, #{userPone}, #{userSex}, #{userStatus}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{nickName}, #{userHeadImage}, #{wachatCity}, #{wachatProvince}, #{wachatCountry}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
